item.title: 荷兰机构称诺和诺德的 Wegovy 成本过高
item.description: 荷兰卫生保健研究所警告说，荷兰不应该承担诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的Wegovy的费用，因为它太贵了，而且这种肥胖症药物的长期疗效还存在 "重大不确定性"。【原文：The Netherlands should not cover the cost of Novo Nordisk A/S’s Wegovy as it’s too expensive and there are “major uncertainties” about the obesity drug’s long-term benefits, the country’s health care institute warned.】

item.title: 交易商加大对美联储利率中枢的押注，黄金跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 随着美联储降息希望的增长以及一些交易商加大了对唐纳德-特朗普第二次当选总统的押注，黄金创下了历史新高。【原文：Gold hit a record high as hopes for Federal Reserve rate cuts grow and some traders ramped up bets on a second Donald Trump presidency.】

item.title: 债券天王在美联储降息前为主动型ETF吸引创纪录的440亿美元资金
item.description: 债券巨头们期待已久的时刻即将到来，而回报就是创纪录的客户现金流入主动管理型 ETF。【原文：The moment bond powerhouses have been waiting for is coming into view, and the payoff is record sums of client cash flowing into actively managed ETFs.】

item.title: Signa 管理员称顾问可能违反了职责
item.description: Signa 一家主要单位的破产管理人正在审查主要顾问是否未能适当履行职责，以便为债权人收回资金。【原文：The insolvency administrators for one of Signa’s main units is reviewing whether key advisers failed to carry out their duties properly, in a bid to recoup funds for creditors.】

item.title: 比特币支持者萨尔瓦多债券是特朗普的热门新兴市场交易品种
item.description: 对一些人来说，这是一个令人担忧的组合：唐纳德-特朗普重回白宫，而一位蛮横的中美洲总统宣称自己是世界上最酷的独裁者。【原文：For some it’s a worrying combination: Donald Trump back in the White House and a brash Central American president who declares himself the world’s coolest dictator.】

item.title: 泰国调查曼谷豪华酒店六名外国人死亡事件
item.description: 泰国总理沙维信（Srettha Thavisin）周二下令对曼谷一家豪华酒店的六名外国人死亡事件展开紧急调查，当局正急于控制该事件对泰国主要旅游业造成的任何影响。【原文：Thai Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin ordered an urgent probe into the deaths of six foreigners at a luxury hotel in Bangkok on Tuesday, as authorities rushed to contain any fallout on the nation’s key tourism industry.】

item.title: 巴宝莉称新任首席执行官将决定创意总监李在镕的未来
item.description: 巴宝莉集团（Burberry Group Plc）主席表示，创意设计师丹尼尔-李（Daniel Lee）的未来将取决于这个陷入困境的时尚品牌新领导人的战略和方向。【原文：The chairman of Burberry Group Plc said the future of creative designer Daniel Lee will depend on the strategy and direction of the struggling fashion brand’s new leader.】

item.title: Blackstone、CVC 权衡对凯雷旗下 StandardAero 的出价
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 和 CVC Capital Partners Plc 等私募股权投资公司正在权衡对 StandardAero 的出价，对这家飞机维修服务提供商的估值可能达到或超过 100 亿美元（包括债务）。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and CVC Capital Partners Plc are among the private equity firms weighing bids for StandardAero that could value the aircraft maintenance services provider at $10 billion or more including debt, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: CenterPoint 因飓风贝里尔导致休斯顿停电而被起诉
item.description: 休斯顿的一些餐馆在飓风贝里尔肆虐后停电数日，这些餐馆起诉了该市的主要公用事业公司，指责 CenterPoint Energy Inc.【原文：A group of Houston restaurants that lost power for days after Hurricane Beryl sued the city’s main utility, accusing CenterPoint Energy Inc. of failing to adequately invest in infrastructure and respond to widespread power outages.】

item.title: 东欧酷夏损害玉米前景
item.description: 东欧和黑海地区酷热难耐，正值玉米生长的关键时期，玉米正在枯萎，引发了供应紧张的担忧。【原文：Scorching heat across eastern Europe and the Black Sea region is withering corn at a crucial time in the crop’s development, driving concerns of a supply squeeze.】

item.title: 高盛、富国银行加入大银行公司债券销售狂潮
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Wells Fargo & Co. are joining rival JPMorgan Chase & Co. in the tapping the US investment-grade bond market after reporting second-quarter earnings.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯获得国际货币基金组织（IMF）主要经济体中最大的增长下调幅度
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）下调了沙特阿拉伯的经济增长预期，下调幅度超过了其跟踪的其他主要经济体，这反映出沙特决定延长石油产量的大幅削减。【原文：The International Monetary Fund has downgraded its growth projections for Saudi Arabia by more than any other major economy it tracks, reflecting the kingdom’s decision to extend deep cuts in oil production.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告通货紧缩放缓可能导致 "更长时间 "的高利率
item.description: 国际货币基金组织警告说，许多主要经济体的通胀降温速度慢于预期，这给全球经济增长带来了利率 "更长时间 "保持较高水平的潜在风险。【原文：The International Monetary Fund warned inflation in many major economies has been cooling slower than expected, raising a potential risk to global growth from interest rates staying higher “for even longer.”】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织上调英国经济增长前景，为新工党政府打气
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）上调了对英国今年经济增长的预测，为新一届工党政府提前打了一支强心针。【原文：The International Monetary Fund has upgraded its forecast for UK economic growth this year in an early boost for the new Labour government.】

item.title: 冷藏公司 Lineage 在美国首次公开募股中最多募集 38.5 亿美元
item.description: 温控存储和物流巨头 Lineage 公司正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集多达 38.5 亿美元的资金。【原文：Temperature-controlled storage and logistics giant Lineage Inc. is seeking to raise as much as $3.85 billion in its initial public offering.】

item.title: 塔塔控股的印度航空公司六月份市场份额在合并前上升
item.description: 印度航空公司（Air India Ltd.）6月份的本地市场份额升至三年来的最高点，这对塔塔集团（Tata Group）旗下的这家印度航空公司来说是个好消息，该公司正在与另一家航空公司合并，以精简业务并吸引更多乘客。【原文：Air India Ltd.’s local market share in June rose to its highest in three years, in a boost for the Tata Group-owned Indian carrier that’s combining with another airline to streamline operations and lure more fliers.】

item.title: 花旗集团北美杠杆贷款部招聘四名员工
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. 聘请了四名员工，以扩大其在北美的杠杆信贷销售和交易团队。【原文：Citigroup Inc. hired four people to expand its leveraged-credit sales and trading team in North America.】

item.title: 约克维尔交易可能加剧股份稀释，特朗普传媒股价下滑
item.description: 作为与 Yorkville Advisors 达成的融资协议的一部分，该公司注册了 3,800 万股股票，在此之后，支持唐纳德-特朗普的媒体初创公司的投资者所持股份可能会被稀释。【原文：Investors backing Donald Trump’s media startup may see their stake diluted after the company registered 38 million shares as part of a financing pact with Yorkville Advisors.】

item.title: 据说阿达尼和威尔玛将考虑出售合资公司 6.7 亿美元的股份
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）和威尔玛国际有限公司（Wilmar International Ltd.）正在与银行进行早期谈判，以出售其消费合资企业阿达尼-威尔玛有限公司（Adani Wilmar Ltd.）的少数股份，熟悉此事的人士称，这有助于该公司遵守持股规定。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani and Wilmar International Ltd. are in early talks with banks to sell a minority stake in their consumer joint venture Adani Wilmar Ltd., people familiar with the matter said, helping the company abide by shareholding regulations.】

item.title: 印度证券交易委员会考虑为散户投资者提供类似对冲基金的产品
item.description: 印度资本市场监管部门正在提议允许资产管理公司为普通投资者提供类似对冲基金的产品，以加大力度遏制未经授权的投资产品的泛滥。【原文：India’s capital market regulator is proposing allowing asset management companies to offer hedge fund-like products for mom-and-pop investors as it steps up efforts to curb proliferation of unauthorized investment products.】

item.title: 橡树山、OneIM 达成 50 亿美元私人信贷合作协议
item.description: 私人信贷公司橡树山顾问公司（Oak Hill Advisors）和 One 投资管理公司（One Investment Management）正在联手合作，这是基金管理公司希望在 1.7 万亿美元的市场中套现的最新合作。【原文：Private credit firms Oak Hill Advisors and One Investment Management are joining forces in the latest tie-up between fund managers looking to cash in on the $1.7 trillion market.】

item.title: 贝莱德称主动型 ETF 到 2030 年有望达到 4 万亿美元
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）对主动管理型 ETF 的增长持乐观态度，因为今年全球投资者向这类策略投入了超过 1600 亿美元。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is optimistic about the growth of actively managed ETFs after investors across the globe poured more than $160 billion into such strategies this year.】

item.title: 法国顶级足球联赛与 Dazn 和 BeIN 达成转播协议
item.description: 法国精英职业足球联赛的大多数成员投票赞成与 Len Blavatnik 的流媒体集团 Dazn Group Ltd. 和卡塔尔体育广播公司 beIN 签订转播协议，播放新赛季的现场比赛。【原文：The majority of France’s elite professional football league voted for a broadcast deal with Len Blavatnik’s streaming group Dazn Group Ltd. and the Qatari sports broadcaster beIN to screen live matches of the new season.】

item.title: 石油多头面临价格反弹的决胜时刻
item.description:
本季度应是全球原油供应最紧张的一个季度，但夏季挤压期一过，基本面就会趋于缓和。【原文：

This quarter should be the tightest of the year for global crude supplies, but once the summer squeeze has passed, fundamentals look set to soften.

item.title: 瑞士奢侈钟表市场遭遇由中国主导的残酷衰退
item.description: 由于紧张的消费者重新考虑在昂贵钟表上挥金如土，以及该行业主要市场之一的需求下滑，瑞士制造的奢侈钟表销售急剧萎缩。【原文：Sales of Swiss-made luxury watches are in sharp retreat as nervous consumers reconsider splashing out on expensive timepieces and demand slumps in one of the industry’s key markets.】

item.title: 英国两年期债券收益率今年首次跌至 4% 以下
item.description: 英国国债反弹，使两年期国债收益率今年首次跌破 4%，因为投资者押注随着通胀放缓，英国央行将很快开始放宽货币政策。【原文：UK government debt rallied, driving the two-year yield below 4% for the first time this year, as investors bet the Bank of England will soon start easing monetary policy as inflation slows.】

item.title: 俄罗斯在土耳其下一座核电站的竞标中遥遥领先
item.description: 俄罗斯国有企业俄罗斯原子能公司（Rosatom Corp.【原文：Russia’s state-owned Rosatom Corp. is “ahead” in a bid to build Turkey’s second nuclear power plant, in the latest sign of Ankara’s growing energy ties with Moscow.】

item.title: 维珍航空撤出中国，取消希思罗机场至上海航线
item.description: 维珍大西洋航空公司（Virgin Atlantic Airways Ltd.）将从 10 月起暂停伦敦希思罗机场和上海之间的航班，放弃其运营的唯一一条通往中国的航线，原因是避开俄罗斯领空的成本很高。【原文：Virgin Atlantic Airways Ltd. is suspending flights between London Heathrow and Shanghai from October, abandoning the only route it operates to China because of the high cost associated with avoiding Russian air space.】

item.title: 高盛携手竞争对手成立新的中东基金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is working on raising a Middle East-focused fund and hired a longtime JPMorgan Chase & Co. banker to run it, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 如果欧盟保证需求，土耳其可增加对欧盟的天然气出口
item.description: 土耳其准备向欧盟出售更多天然气，但希望获得长期承诺，以证明所需的基础设施投资是合理的。土耳其还希望避开欧盟为避免俄罗斯天然气而推动的任何复杂的交换。【原文：Turkey is ready to sell more natural gas to the European Union but wants long-term commitments to justify the infrastructure investment needed. It also wants to side-step any complicated swaps that the bloc is pushing to avoid Russian gas.】
